item.title: Apache Hop 2.12 is available!!
item.description: After about two months of work on 58 tickets by 11 contributors, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.12.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible. Â Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.12 brings: Variable resolvers Various improvements Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.12.0 right away.
